dct_title_s: Plan of the city of Detroit.
dct_description_sm: Shows ward boundaries. Shows railroads and public buildings. Oriented with north to the upper right. Plate 80 from Mitchell's New General Atlas. On verso: plate 79, map of Michigan, (western part of Upper Peninsula not shown). 1 map: col.; 29 x 36 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
